directions: In a medium bowl, blend the cream cheese, lemon juice and hot pepper sauce. Stir in the green onions and crabmeat. Chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
When ready to serve, top with cocktail sauce.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked
title: Crab and Cheese Spread
